
snap(0,30,50)

sky(220,238,233)
fog(150,180,200)
ground(100,130,150)
polys(105,135,155)

density(9)
fadefrom(4000)

name(Madness everywhere)

nlaps(8)

set(47,0,0,0)p
set(10,0,5600,0)p
set(10,0,11200,0)p
chk(40,0,13200,0)
set(14,0,15500,0)pt
set(10,4100,15500,90)p
set(32,3900,16000,-90)pr
set(10,9700,15500,90)p
chk(40,11700,15500,90)
set(14,14000,15500,-90)pt
set(10,14000,11200,180)p
set(10,14000,5600,0)p
chk(40,14000,3600,0)
set(14,14000,1050,-180)pt
set(10,9700,1050,-90)p
set(10,4100,1050,-90)p

set(33,1700,1050,90)pr
set(33,-1700,1050,90)pr

set(10,-4100,1050,90)p
set(10,-9700,1050,90)p
chk(40,-11700,1050,90)
set(14,-14000,1050,0)pt

set(29,-14000,-4400,180)pr
set(29,-14000,-8450,0)pr


set(10,-14000,-3300,0)p
set(10,-14000,-8900,0)p
set(10,-14000,-10000,0)p
set(10,-14000,-11300,0)p
chk(40,-14000,-13300,0)
set(14,-14000,-15500,90)pt
set(10,-9700,-15500,90)p
set(32,-10100,-16000,-90)pr
set(10,-4100,-15500,90)p
chk(40,-2100,-15500,90)
set(14,0,-15500,-180)pt

set(28,0,-6756,0)po

set(10,0,-11300,0)p
set(10,0,-8600,0)p
set(10,0,-5600,0)p


set(28,-7000,-7225,-45)pr
set(28,7000,7225,-45)pr
set(28,8000,-8500,45)pr
set(28,-8500,8000,45)pr

set(32,14500,10800,180)pr
set(32,13500,10800,180)pr

set(37,14000,9400,90)po
set(37,14500,7800,90)po
set(37,13500,7800,90)po

fix(41,500,1050,-1980,90)s

maxr(11,20000,-24400)
maxb(8,-21500,-17400)
maxt(8,21500,-17400)
maxl(11,-20000,-24400)
